nodes.text: The First Responder medpac was a model of medpac produced by Athakam Medtech and available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The medpac carried instruments for emergency field surgery, a diagnostic computer, a medscanner, advanced synth-nutrient replicators, spray splints and drugs to counter radiation and biological poisons. A single First Responder cost 400 credits.
The First Responder medpac was created for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013.
